name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a separate pan, fry the minced beef until browned.
Add chopped onion and garlic, and cook until soft.
Stir in the canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C.
Mix the flour, cocoa powder, and baking powder in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk the eggs, sugar, and melted butter.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients.
Pour the batter into a greased cake tin and bake for 30 minutes.

name: Grilled Chicken
steps: Season the chicken with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill the chicken over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side until fully cooked.
Serve hot with your choice of sides.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the pizza base.
Add slices of mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake at 220°C for 10-15 minutes.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar in a bowl.
Whisk eggs and milk, then gradually mix with the dry ingredients.
Heat a pan, melt butter, and cook pancakes for 2-3 minutes on each side.

name: Bruschetta
steps: Slice the baguette and toast lightly.
Chop tomatoes and mix with minced garlic, olive oil, and salt.
Spoon the tomato mixture onto the bread slices and garnish with basil.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Chop the romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons, grated Parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
Top with grilled chicken if desired.

name: Tomato Soup
steps: Fry chopped onions and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth and garnish with basil.

name: Tiramisu
steps: Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them in a dish.
Mix mascarpone and sugar, then spread over the ladyfingers.
Dust with cocoa powder and refrigerate for 4 hours before serving.

name: Garlic Bread
steps: Mix softened butter with minced garlic, parsley, and salt.
Slice the baguette and spread the garlic butter on each slice.
Bake at 180°C for 10 minutes until crispy.

name: Beef Stew
steps: Brown the beef cubes in a large pot.
Add chopped onions, carrots, and potatoes.
Pour in the beef broth, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 2 hours.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Chop tomatoes and cucumber, and mix with olives and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano before serving.

name: French Onion Soup
steps: Cook sliced onions in butter until caramelized.
Add beef broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve with toasted baguette slices and melted Gruyere cheese on top.

name: Minestrone Soup
steps: Chop all vegetables and sauté them in a large pot.
Add tomatoes, broth, and pasta, and simmer until the pasta is cooked.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella, and arrange them on a plate.
Top with basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
steps: Cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic.
Add heavy cream and Parmesan, stirring until creamy.
Toss the pasta in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.

name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Coat chicken breasts in beaten egg, then dip in breadcrumbs.
Fry until golden brown, then place in a baking dish.
Top with tomato sauce and mozzarella, and bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Fry the minced beef with chopped onions and chili powder.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.

name: Lasagna
steps: Fry minced beef with onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and simmer.
Layer lasagna sheets, beef sauce, and béchamel in a baking dish.
Top with mozzarella and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Fry onions and garlic in butter, then add chicken and cook until browned.
Add tomato puree, cream, and garam masala, then simmer for 20 minutes.

name: Panna Cotta
steps: Soak gelatin in cold water.
Heat cream, milk, sugar, and vanilla in a pot until sugar dissolves.
Add gelatin and stir. Pour into molds and refrigerate for 4 hours.

name: Apple Pie
steps: Peel and slice apples. Mix with sugar and cinnamon.
Prepare pie crust with flour, butter, and egg. Place apples in crust.
Cover with more crust and bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.

name: Cheesecake
steps: Crush graham crackers and mix with melted butter to form the crust.
Mix cream cheese, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Pour over crust.
Bake at 160°C for 30 minutes and refrigerate for 2 hours.

name: Fruit Salad
steps: Chop all fruits and mix in a bowl.
Add lemon juice and honey, and mix gently before serving.

name: Brownies
steps: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Mix flour, sugar, eggs, and baking powder, then stir in melted chocolate.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes and let cool before cutting.

name: spring_rolls
steps: Sauté cabbage, carrots, garlic, and ginger in a pan.
Add shrimp and soy sauce, and stir-fry until cooked.
Wrap the mixture in spring roll wrappers and fry until golden.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
steps: Remove mushroom stems and chop them finely.
Mix cream cheese, garlic, breadcrumbs, and parsley with chopped stems.
Stuff the mushrooms and bake at 180°C for 15 minutes.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
steps: Cut mozzarella into sticks.
Coat each stick in flour, dip in beaten egg, and then coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown and crispy.

name: Deviled Eggs
steps: Boil eggs for 10 minutes, then cool and peel.
Cut eggs in half and remove the yolks.
Mash yolks with mayonnaise and mustard, and spoon back into the whites.
Sprinkle with paprika before serving.

name: Caprese Skewers
steps: Thread cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and basil leaves onto skewers.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Caesar Soup
steps: Fry onions and garlic until soft.
Add lettuce and chicken broth, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth and garnish with Parmesan and croutons.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Cook chicken in broth, then shred.
Add chopped carrots, celery, and onions, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add noodles and cook until tender.

name: Pumpkin Soup
steps: Sauté onions in olive oil, then add chopped pumpkin and broth.
Simmer until pumpkin is soft, then blend until smooth.
Stir in cream and cumin, and serve hot.

name: Clam Chowder
steps: Sauté onions and potatoes in butter.
Add clams, milk, and cream, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Garnish with parsley before serving.
